channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- VirusScan Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- VirusScan Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2016-8030|2024-08-06T02:13:21.817Z -- mcafee -- virusscan%20enterprise
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability in Scriptscan COM Object in McAfee VirusScan Enterprise 8.8 Patch 8 and earlier allows remote attackers to create a Denial of Service on the active Internet Explorer tab via a crafted HTML link.
